Professional Declutter Services in Perth Area

Do you open your cupboards and scream, HELP!! And then quickly close them again? Well, you shouldn't have to, you should open up your pantry or wardrobe and breath out a large sigh of relief because you can finally find everything.

Find Out More

A clean house makes for a clean mind

This is a job for a perfectionist, one would even call these people OCD! And that is me...im here to help re organise, stylize whatever it may be that you need help with. Office work, that's lying around, clothes that need sorting, labeling food containers so you don't keep buying another bottle of you know what?!

I'm a local freo declutter queen that has lived with 3 boys and my husband for 13 years now and so I have lots of experience with managing a clean, organized and clutter free home.

Get Started!

At Your Service

The diamond package aka the Declutter service

This includes 30 minutes of meet and greet. Then 3 hrs of solid decluttering. This must be done working together, as it provides a thorough understanding of what one would like to keep and what one would like to Declutter from their homes. This service also provides tips and tricks and a op-shop drop off.

The Marie Kondo way aka let’s organise your life

This package includes a 30 minute meet and greet and then 3 hrs of solid re-organising of your items in your home. I will show you ways to store, fold and make use of the items you already have in your home, so you don’t need to keep buying another storage item that just ends up taking up more space in your house.

Travels aka packing and moving house

This package is for the amount of time it takes to pack up all your belongings into organised boxes and then to get them moved to your new home. This package is at a rate of $35 p/hr. The boxes will need to be provided by yourself-plus the moving truck. I just bring the brains and the muscles. I also will provide an itinerary.

Finding love again aka unpacking your boxes

This package includes how ever long it takes to unpack and properly store away all your items into a well organised and designed home again. This package is at a rate of $35p/hr. This package does require the owner of the items to be present to then best un pack your new home.
